text: National Route 44 is a national highway in South Korea connects Yangpyeong County to Yangyang County. It established on 31 August 1971.대통령령 제5771호 일반국도노선지정령, 1971년 8월 31일 제정. ==Main stopovers== Yangyang IC entrance at Yangyang County ; Gyeonggi Province * Yangpyeong County ; Gangwon Province * Hongcheon County - Inje County - Yangyang County ==Major Intersections== * (■): Motorway IS: Intersection, IC: Interchange === Gyeonggi Province === {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;" |- !
